tree.name: Julius Randle
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: MIN sent Karl-Anthony Towns to NYK and a 2025 2nd round pick (Alex Toohey) to CHA. MIN received Julius Randle, Donte DiVincenzo, Keita Bates-Diop, and 2025 1st round pick (via DET, top-13 protected, became Joan Beringer #17) from NYK.
tree.note: 3-time All-Star power forward from Kentucky. Shared trade cost with DiVincenzo and Beringer.

assetsGivenUp.name: Karl-Anthony Towns
assetsGivenUp.note: 7'0" center from Kentucky, 2015 #1 overall pick. Sent to NYK.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: MIN 2025 2nd round pick, sent to CHA as part of 3-team trade
